participant_1.background:
I have a secret stash of snacks in my room that my parents don't know about.
i have been at my job for seven years.
I'm often not taken seriously because of my pink hair.
I want to use my skills to help people in need.
during the week , i work as a barista.

participant_2.background:
My favorite people are my pets, Felix and Emmy.
i like video games.
I don't know much about my parents because they left me when I was young.
i m about to go off to college at a very liberal school soon.
I live a quiet life and enjoy my own company.

content.text: Hey there! I'm a barista and I love my job. How about you?
I'm going to college soon, and I'm really excited about that.
Oh, that's awesome! What are you planning to study?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm thinking about something in the arts.
Cool! I love the arts. I like to draw and paint in my spare time.
That's really cool! I like to play video games in my spare time.
Oh, I love video games too! What's your favorite game?
I like a lot of different games, but my favorite is probably The Sims.
Oh, I love that game! I used to play it all the time when I was younger.
Yeah, it's a lot of fun. I like building houses and designing families.
Me too! I like to make my families as crazy as possible.
Haha, that's awesome. I like to make mine as realistic as possible.
Well, it sounds like we have a lot in common. I'm sure we'll be good friends.
Yeah, I think so too. It's nice to meet you!
